StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MSupd_PRECOMMISSION_DATA]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: @c1 int,@c2 int,@c3 int,@c4 int,@c5 int,@c6 date.me,@c7 char(1),@c8 char(1),@c9 int,@c10 char(1),@c11 date.me,@c12 varchar(15),@c13 date.me,@pkc1 int ,@bitmap binary(2) as if substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 1 = 1 begin update [PRECOMMISSION_DATA] set [PRECOMMISSION_ID] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 1 when 1 then @c1 else [PRECOMMISSION_ID] end ,[NWA_ID] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 2 when 2 then @c2 else [NWA_ID] end ,[CONTRACT_ID] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 4 when 4 then @c3 else [CONTRACT_ID] end ,[TBS_ID] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 8 when 8 then @c4 else [TBS_ID] end ,[FY_ACTIVE_DUTY_ASSIGNMENT] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 16 when 16 then @c5 else [FY_ACTIVE_DUTY_ASSIGNMENT] end ,[PROJ_LAW_GRAD_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 32 when 32 then @c6 else [PROJ_LAW_GRAD_DATE] end ,[FLIGHT_INDOCTRINATION] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 64 when 64 then @c7 else [FLIGHT_INDOCTRINATION] end ,[PRIVATE_PILOT] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 128 when 128 then @c8 else [PRIVATE_PILOT] end ,[FLIGHT_HOURS] = case substring(@bitmap,2,1) & 1 when 1 then @c9 else [FLIGHT_HOURS] end ,[CERTIFIED_CROSS_COUNTRY] = case substring(@bitmap,2,1) & 2 when 2 then @c10 else [CERTIFIED_CROSS_COUNTRY] end ,[REQUEST_FOR_APPOINTMENT_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,2,1) & 4 when 4 then @c11 else [REQUEST_FOR_APPOINTMENT_DATE] end ,[USER_LOGIN] = case substring(@bitmap,2,1) & 8 when 8 then @c12 else [USER_LOGIN] end ,[UPDATE_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,2,1) & 16 when 16 then @c13 else [UPDATE_DATE] end where [PRECOMMISSION_ID] = @pkc1 if @@rowcount = 0 if @@microso.version>0x07320000 exec sp_MSreplraiserror 20598 end else begin update [PRECOMMISSION_DATA] set [NWA_ID] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 2 when 2 then @c2 else [NWA_ID] end ,[CONTRACT_ID] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 4 when 4 then @c3 else [CONTRACT_ID] end ,[TBS_ID] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 8 when 8 then @c4 else [TBS_ID] end ,[FY_ACTIVE_DUTY_ASSIGNMENT] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 16 when 16 then @c5 else [FY_ACTIVE_DUTY_ASSIGNMENT] end ,[PROJ_LAW_GRAD_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 32 when 32 then @c6 else [PROJ_LAW_GRAD_DATE] end ,[FLIGHT_INDOCTRINATION] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 64 when 64 then @c7 else [FLIGHT_INDOCTRINATION] end ,[PRIVATE_PILOT] = case substring(@bitmap,1,1) & 128 when 128 then @c8 else [PRIVATE_PILOT] end ,[FLIGHT_HOURS] = case substring(@bitmap,2,1) & 1 when 1 then @c9 else [FLIGHT_HOURS] end ,[CERTIFIED_CROSS_COUNTRY] = case substring(@bitmap,2,1) & 2 when 2 then @c10 else [CERTIFIED_CROSS_COUNTRY] end ,[REQUEST_FOR_APPOINTMENT_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,2,1) & 4 when 4 then @c11 else [REQUEST_FOR_APPOINTMENT_DATE] end ,[USER_LOGIN] = case substring(@bitmap,2,1) & 8 when 8 then @c12 else [USER_LOGIN] end ,[UPDATE_DATE] = case substring(@bitmap,2,1) & 16 when 16 then @c13 else [UPDATE_DATE] end where [PRECOMMISSION_ID] = @pkc1 if @@rowcount = 0 if @@microso.version>0x07320000 exec sp_MSreplraiserror 20598 end
